description: The '''WCK Band (Windward Caribbean Kulture)''' was formed in 1988 in [[Dominica]]. The band played a blend of the local [[Cadence-lypso]] and traditional [[Jing ping]], [[Chante mas]] and [[lapo kabwit]] rhythms, which would later be labelled [[Bouyon music|bouyon]], a genre which they are credited with creating in the late 1980s.
